Scene:
Sanemori's Explanation
(Sanemori monogatari / 実盛物語)

Play: The Nunobiki Waterfall (源平布引滝)

Production: October 1974

– Click image to view.



Narrators (Tayu):

(竹本越路大夫 (四))



Shamisen Players:

(野澤勝平 (二))

(端敵)

(子役)

(武氏)
